title.rendered: First Day Jitters + Back To School + Textbook Buybacks + New Stock!

content.rendered:
First Day Jitters

We are getting some great feedback from schools in Bibb, Peach, and Houston counties about our First Day Jitters giveaway! Homemade “Thank You” cards from some classes have already reached us, along with several class pictures of the kids with their books. We are so blessed by our community and especially happy to hear that the giveaway was as exciting for everyone as it was for us!

Check out more information about the First Day Jitters giveaway in the Telegraph.

http://www.macon.com/news/local/education/article163518953.html

 

Back To School

School is already back in session and there’s no better time than now to get your child on a reading schedule. Visit us today and find your child’s next favorite book!

 

Textbook Buybacks

College students: It’s a new semester, but don’t let your old textbooks take up too much room on your bookshelf. Bring us your textbooks because we pay CASH!

 

New Stock!

Come check out our New Stock sections at each of our locations. We are able to offer popular titles at affordable prices!
